揱字的基本解释

揱
xiāo
手臂细长漂亮。
细长：“望其辐，欲其揱尔而纤也。”

揱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiāo］［shuò］
［《廣韻》相邀切，平宵，心。］
［《廣韻》所教切，去效，生。］
［《廣韻》所角切，入覺，生。］
削尖之貌。

揱字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　揱； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页444第18
【唐韻】所角切【集韻】色角切，?音朔。【說文】人臂長好貌。【徐鍇曰】人臂稍長纖好也。　又【唐韻】相邀切【集韻】【韻會】思邀切，?音宵。義同。一曰殺小貌。【周禮·冬官考工記·輪人】望其輻，欲其揱爾而纖也。　又【集韻】息約切，音削。亦殺小也。　又【唐韻】【集韻】?所敎切，筲去聲。義與《說文》同。一曰木上小也。與?同。　又【集韻】師咸切。與摻同。好手貌。

揱字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
揱字的起名意思

暂无。

Chuckle
Basic explanation of words
Chuckle
xiāo
The arms are slender and beautiful.
Slender: "Look at its spokes, and want it to be smooth and slender."
Chuckle
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [xiāo] [shuò]
["Guangyun" invites each other, calm night, heart. ]
["Guangyun" teaches cut, de-effects, and produces. ]
[The corner cut in "Guang Yun", enters consciousness, and is born. ]
Sharpened appearance.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　揱; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 444 18
[Tang Yun] Cut at the corners [Ji Yun] Cut at the color corners,? Yin Shuo. [Speaking of text] Humans have long arms and good looks. [Xu Kai said] Human arms are slightly longer and slender.　[Tang Yun] Invited to cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Invited to cut,? Yin Xiao. The same meaning. One said to kill the small appearance. 【Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji·Lun Ren】Look at its spokes, and want it to be refined and slender.　[Jiyun] The breath is cut, and the sound is cut. Also kill the small too.　[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? All cut, Shao go. Righteousness is the same as "Suo Wen". One said that the wood is small. Same as?　[Jiyun] Master Xianqie. With blending. Good looks.
